question.title: socket io java android app and socket io javascript server reliable connection possible?
question.body:
I need to make a reliable socket io solution for my android apps for chatting app or similar. When I was tinkering with the system I noticed the socketio java client is getting disconnected every few seconds from the socketio javascript server that I am using for hello world relay server.

I have a device setup to talk to the server but I noticed after 25 to 75 seconds it gets disconnected. I have everything in default settings. I thought socket io server will be good enough as an alternative to firebase but I am not getting reliable connection with this:

 socket = IO.socket(uri, opts).also { s ->
            s.on(Socket.EVENT_CONNECT) { ...
            s.on(Socket.EVENT_DISCONNECT) { ... // after few seconds its state is disconnected.

client version:

implementation("io.socket:socket.io-client:2.1.1")

server version:

"socket.io": "^4.8.1",

server:

const io  = new Server(app, { cors: { origin: '*' } });

io.on('connection', socket => {...} // on message... etc. simple hello world server.

question_comments.body: "So network condition is not the primary fact." - Probably not. But it is still subject to some kinds of networking-related functionality; e.g. iptables on Linux. But either way, you need to figure out why the connections are getting disconnected. If you think this is a programming problem and you want people to help you debug it, you need to provide a minimal reproducible example.
@StephenC this disconnection happens on localhost and on server. So network condition is not the primary fact. I want to know if socket io java and javascript server connection is really reliable.

The reliability of a network connection is conditional on the client, the server and the network between. You need to figure out why the sockets are getting disconnected. (And that is probably not a "programming" problem! It could be a networking / firewall issue, but this is not the correct place to ask this question.)
